author: jgm
content:
It's a bit like slashing, in that as long as someone is doing it, it doesn't need everyone to do it.

https://github.com/wealdtech/comptrollerd/ does this work, although it's pretty heavyweight as it requires https://github.com/wealdtech/execd (in theory it could be rewritten to use and execution archive node directly, but we already have this database so use it).  We do keep an eye on the difference between the bid value and payment to the proposer fee recipient, and would make noise if we found any significant discrepancies (at current a number of relays under-bid / over-pay, probably due to the more complex situations such as the proposer fee recipient having transactions in the payload, but  we care more about the over-bid / under-pay scenario).
